1 - Hello World.lang:
<sentence>
    Hello World! This is your first sentence.
</sentence>

13 - If (Explicit) 2.lang:
<sentence>
    <if condition="sir">
        <else>Mr.</else>
    </if>
    <data key="name" />
    will rock this party.
</sentence>

14 - If Local State.lang:
<sentence>
    Shaira loves
    <either>
        <this id="air">air planes</this>
        <this id="rail">trains</this>
    </either>.
    She likes watching the
    <if condition="#air">clouds below her.</if>
    <if condition="#rail">country side around her.</if>
</sentence>

15 - Compound If Condition.lang:
<sentence>
    <text>
        <if condition="female & married">Mrs.</if>
        <if condition="female & !married">Ms.</if>
        <if condition="!female">Mr.</if>
    </text>
    <data key="last_name|first_name" />
    likes Trains.
</sentence>

16 - Unless.lang:
<sentence>
    <unless condition="sir">Mr.</unless>
    <data key="name" />
    will rock this party.
</sentence>

19 - Case Study - Welcome Description.lang:
<sentence>
    Language files on steriods for
    <either>
        <this>UIs</this>
        <or>apps</or>
        <or>web apps</or>
        <or>websites</or>
        <or>forms</or>
        <or>bots</or>
    </either>
    that
    <either>
        <this>aren't</this>
        <or>are not</or>
        <or id="direct-negative">
            don't
            <maybe>
                want to
                <maybe id="be">be</maybe>
            </maybe>
            <unless condition="#be">
                <either>
                    <this>seem</this>
                    <or>get</or>
                    <or>become</or>
                </either>
            </unless>
        </or>
    </either>
    <either>
        <this>boring</this>
        <or>repetitive</or>
        <or>monotonous</or>
        <or>dull</or>
    </either>
</sentence>

7 - Ref.lang:
<sentence>
    I really
    <either id="affection">
        <this>like</this>
        <or>love</or>
    </either>
    Trains.
    My cousin <ref id="affection">s them aswell.
</sentence>
